tables.title: Concourse Encounters
tables.description: Crowded station situations between docking bays and markets.

entries.result: Security drones scan for fugitives; one pings on a crew member.
A rival captain taunts the crew with a better cargo contract.
A courier collapses, dropping a datachip marked urgent.
A pop-up market offers prototype gear with questionable licenses.
A protest blocks access to the docks, chanting anti-corp slogans.
A maintenance worker begs escort to the reactor after sabotage threats.
A smuggler discreetly offers passage for stowaways the crew knows.
Docking clamps glitch, risking damage unless someone overrides controls.
A celebrity explorer signs autographs and invites the crew to a gala.
Station lockdown initiates; shutters slam down until the threat is found.

tables.title: Station Sparks
tables.description: Quick prompts to color downtime aboard the habitat.

entries.result: Artificial dawn glitches; half the station stays dim for hours.
An old war mural lights up, showing ships the crew doesn't recognize.
A vendor sells freeze-dried snacks named after the crew's ship.
Gravity cycling to 0.3g sparks impromptu microgravity performances.
A holo-news ticker scrolls rumors about the crew's last mission.
A child asks for help finding a missing maintenance bot.
A veteran salvager tells a ghost story about the unused docking ring.
A sun flare paints the viewport copper, delaying faster-than-light lanes.

tables.title: Station Glitches
tables.description: Malfunctions that add tension or urgency.

entries.result: Atmospheric processors hiccup, dropping oxygen levels for ten minutes.
Gravity plating pulses, flinging unsecured objects across the deck.
Thermal alarms scream as coolant leaks into maintenance tunnels.
Docking guidance failures threaten to collide two shuttles.
Holo-projectors overlay outdated security zones, confusing navigation.
An unscheduled reactor purge forces a timed evacuation of central modules.
